name: The Grand Heist of Neon City
name_original: The Grand Heist of Neon City
description:
FYI: I STRONGLY RECOMMEND DOWNLOADING THE DESKTOP VERSION as it's less laggy and has fullscreen support.

Killing robots is extremely laggy and there's basically nothing I can do about it.

Just another beautiful day/night in Neon City...

A four-person crew of Aldehyde (you), Ruck, Professor Zmierzchalski and Biggins has just discovered how to safely inject Neon into a person's body. The noble gases have a unique property that separates their timeline from the rest of the world. As a result, after receiving strontium neon-hydroxide into your bloodstream, time flows for you separately. This makes the heist of the Neon Crystal in the Chemistry Museum a lot easier... or does it?

Credits

Made (almost) entirely by 89o in 2 weeks for the Amaze Me game jam.

Special thanks to Oiva for playtesting.

Most sounds and ambiences are from FreeSound.org under the Creative Commons 0 license.
